jp.ac.u_tokyo.kyoyo.seo.nicoapilib

クラス CommentInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • jp.ac.u_tokyo.kyoyo.seo.nicoapilib.CommentInfo

  • public class CommentInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    コメントの取得・管理をする
    This class keeps information of each comment also provides methods to parse response in Json to this class.
    note
    JSONArray passed to parse(JSONArray) is supposed to gotten from message server like this;
    http://msg.nicovideo.jp/10/api.json/thread?version=20090904&thread={0}&res_from=-{1}
    query should be like that (details is unknown)
    params of query;
    {0} : thread ID of target video, also can be gotten from getflv API
    {1} : max number of comment, must not be over 1000
    url of message server can be gotten from getflv API, but when you do HttpGet to this url, response is XML format. By adding ".json" at the end of this url, you can get response in Json.
    Also you can get the same? response in XML by posting to the message server url;
     <packet>
      <thread thread="{0}" version="20090904"  />
      <thread_leaves scores="1" thread="{0}">0-{2}:100,1000</thread_leaves>
 </packet>

    {0} : thread ID, {2} : video length in minutes ( rounded up)

    expected response format;
     <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 <packet>
     <thread
          resultcode="0"
          thread="1173108780"
          server_time="1487684957"
          last_res="4464366"
          ticket="0x087dabd6"
          revision="12"
          click_revision="34166"/>
     <leaf
          thread="1173108780"
          count="1520974"/>
     ...............
     <chat
          thread="1173108780"
          no="4118020"
          vpos="36114"
          leaf="6"
          date="1361103390"
          score="-2200"
          premium="1"
          anonymity="1"
          user_id="Yg_6QWiiS_T2mq3WJuzUcp41MvQ"
          mail="184">
              混ぜるな危険ｗｗｗ
          </chat>
  .......
 </packet>


    references;
    how to get comment form Nico : [NANOWAY]ニコニコ動画のコメント解析
    [まぢぽん製作所]ニコニコ動画・ニコニコ生放送のコメント取得　備忘録
    NG level of comment in NIco : [ニコニコ大百科]NG共有機能 details of comment : [ニコニコ大百科]コメント

    • フィールドの詳細

      • start

        public long start
        コメントが右から流れ始める時間　単位はミリ秒
        time when the comment begins to flow from one side to the other, measured in milli seconds.

      • content

        public java.lang.String content
        コメントの内容
        content of the comment

      • date

        public java.lang.String date
        コメントの投稿日時、共通形式に従う
        date when the comment is contributed, based on common format

      • anonymity

        public int anonymity
        コメントの匿名性
        whether or not the comment is anonymous
        yes:0, no:1(default)

      • ngLevel

        public int ngLevel
        コメントのNGレベルの指標です
        NG level of this comment.
        この値が大きいほどＮＧされた数が多いコメントであることを意味します。範囲[0-3] 0から順にＮＧ共有レベル強・中・弱・無の閾値に対応します.
        The larger this value, the more NG this comment receives, in range 0-3.

      • commentNo

        public int commentNo
        ひとつの動画において各コメントに一意的な値です
        Numbering of this comment.

      • x

        public float x
        画面上のコメントの座標（ピクセル単位）
        x,y-coordinate on screen, measured in pixels

      • y

        public float y
        画面上のコメントの座標（ピクセル単位）
        x,y-coordinate on screen, measured in pixels

      • length

        public float length
        コメントの画面上での長さ(ピクセル単位)
        length on screen, measured in pixels

      • speed

        public float speed
        コメントの流れる速さ（ピクセル/s）
        speed with which the comment flows, measured in pixels per second

      • color

        public int color
        コメントの色
        color of the comment

      • size

        public float size
        表示行の高さに対するコメントサイズの比率
        ratio of comment size to max height, can be between 0.0 to 1.0

      • position

        public int position
        コメントの位置 POSITION定数
        position of the comment, can be the following constants; POSITION_****

    • メソッドの詳細

      • initialize

        public void initialize(float width,
                       android.graphics.Paint paint,
                       float span,
                       float offset)
        実際にCanvasに描写する際、必要なフィールドを初期化する
        Initialize fields needed for being shown on Canvas.
        パラメータ:
        width - width of Canvas in pix
        paint - cannot be null
        span - time in which the comment flows from one side to the other in seconds
        offset - offset in the direction of y in pixels

      • parse

        protected static CommentInfo.CommentGroup parse(org.json.JSONArray root)
                                         throws NicoAPIException
        APIからのレスポンスをパースして、時系列に整列したリストを返す
        Parses JSONObject form message server and return items sorted along the time series
        パラメータ:
        root - response from message server, cannot be null
        戻り値:
        Returns empty list if response contains no items
        例外:
        NicoAPIException - if API response does not follow expected format or argument is null
        関連項目:
        expected response format

      • parse

        protected static CommentInfo.CommentGroup parse(java.lang.String xml)
                                         throws NicoAPIException
        例外:
        NicoAPIException
